Description: Fragment of shoulder of Attic white-ground, perhaps black-figured, pottery lekythos; splash of glaze at bottom of neck; band of hasty tongues above band of rays on shoulder; body slipped cream-white; two bands at top, key maeander band and further band below.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1944)
